00044 #ifndef ROTL32
00045 # define ROTL32(x, s) (((x) << (s)) | ((x) >> (32 - (s))))
00046 #endif
00047 #ifndef ROTR32
00048 # define ROTR32(x, s) (((x) >> (s)) | ((x) << (32 - (s))))
00049 #endif
